comments.body:
Pardon for the late comment.

The return value is an array.
It would be better to illustrate when more than one SortOrder would be returned (and how they are used).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +49,53 @@ * before passing those records to the data source table on write. *

* Implementations may return an empty array if they don't require any specific ordering of data * on write. *
